mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "From the Floor", "On the Record and Record Report", "Square Dance Date Book", "As I See It, by Bob Osgood", "Local Square Dance Publications", "The Dancer's Walkthru", "New Basics? Why? by Russ and Betsy Ard", "Overseas Dateline", "Proc-4 by Bob Begg", "Square Dancing at the Holidays", "Ladies on the Square", "Square Dance Fun Knows No Age Limit by Dorothy Mann", "Square Dancing Part of School Curriculum by Roland M. Chaisson", "Style Series: Bucket of Worms", "National Square Dance Convention", "Round the Outside Ring", "Workshop", "The Caller of the Month: Linc Gallacher", "Paging the Roundancers: Carl & Pat Smith", and "Experimental Lab: Cast Off Like a Wheel and Deal".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
